Goat Lips offers event spaces and rental rooms for your next gathering in Pensacola, Florida!
Our backyard, back deck, bar and dining room are perfect event spaces for parties, meetings, dinners, weddings and more. There’s a spot at Goat Lips that suits your needs and budget.
We can offer an experience unlike anywhere else
and guests can enjoy all the amenities that Goat Lips has to offer, such as live music, a diverse selection of chews & brews, great company and space to explore.

Portrait by Clint Davis
“It’s going to come together like Goat Lips.”
— Larry Cowan
A Pensacola original for almost 20 years, Goat Lips is known far and wide for our great food, craft beer, live music, and our uncompromising commitment to customer service.
We would love the opportunity to show you our
one-of-a-kind
brand of fun.
Stop by today and discover one of the truly great secrets in Northwest Florida.
Still not convinced? We’ll keep going!
Goat Lips is
sandwiched
between the University of West Florida, Ellyson Industrial Park, Baptist Hospital and West Florida Hospital helps make up our eclectic customer base.
Now, just add in the surrounding military bases — in fact, the National Guard is stationed inside Ellyson Industrial Park, and Goat Lips is equidistant from Pensacola NAS, Corry Station, Saufley Field and Whiting Field. We often host Navy retirement parties, tie cutting ceremonies and a change of command for helicopter squadrons. The Marine Corps meets here monthly and does planning for their “Heroes Among Us“ speaker series. That should make you feel safe!!
We asked our customers to describe Goat Lips, so here are a few of their comments:
“
friendly hangout spot, great atmosphere, live music, good service, best hole in the wall, great nano-brewery, Krazy George does best karaoke, can come hear my friends play at open mic
night
.”
If you’re hungry or thirsty in Pensacola, just bring it on down to Goat Lips.
We’ll see you soon.
We serve the best muffuletta in Pensacola!
Visit the fire-pit out back!
Try The Sweet Potato Beer!
Live music five nights a week!
Bring your friends!
Copyright © 2025 Goat Lips. All rights reserved.
